title: The Thousand Eyes of Dr. Mabuse (restored, colorized) (1960, Dir: Fritz Lang, crime, imdb score: 7)

sources.title: The Thousand Eyes of Dr. Mabuse (restored, colorized) (1960, Dir: Fritz Lang, crime, imdb score: 7)
sources.description: The Thousand Eyes of Dr. Mabuse (German Die 1000 Augen des Dr. Mabuse ) is a 1960 black-and-white crime thriller film directed by Fritz Lang in his final film. A West German/French/Italian international co-production, it starred Peter van Eyck, Dawn Addams and Gert Fr√∂be. The film made use of the character Dr. Mabuse, who had appeared in earlier films by Lang in 1922 and 1933. The Thousand Eyes of Dr. Mabuse spawned a film series of German Mabuse films that were released over the following years to compete with Rialto Film's Krimi films.
